messages.message: Search for a handful of places in the code that could be more efficient. Create a report and open a PR to fix one. <important-message>Clone milosriki/client-vital-suite and do the task in it.</important-message>

Congrats on starting your first session! I'm excited to work with you.

Here are some things to know about working with me:
- Try tagging @Devin in Slack for small bug fixes ([configure integration here](app.devin.ai/settings/integrations))
- I can make draft PRs of backlog work

Some tips for success:
- Give me tasks that you know how to do yourself
- Tell me how to test or check that I'm on the right track
- Keep sessions under ~3 hours and break down big tasks
- Share detailed requirements upfront
- Invest in coaching me by providing feedback in chat - I'll improve over time

[More tips for first-time users](https://docs.devin.ai/essential-guidelines/instructing-devin-effectively)
I'll clone the repository, analyze the code for efficiency improvements, create a report, and open a PR to fix one of the issues. Let me get started.

I've completed the analysis and created a PR with one fix. Here's the summary:

**Efficiency Report** (8 issues identified):

1. **ClientTable.tsx - Unmemoized Sorting (HIGH IMPACT)** - Fixed in PR
2. Dashboard.tsx - Multiple separate API calls that could be batched
3. useClientHealthScores.ts - Sequential database calls
4. TickerFeed.tsx - Array duplication for animation
5. ClientRiskMatrix.tsx - Helper functions recreated on every render
6. Navigation.tsx - Static arrays recreated on render
7. KanbanBoard.tsx - Calculations inside render loop
8. LiveActivityFeed.tsx - Object creation in function

**PR Created:** https://github.com/milosriki/client-vital-suite/pull/50

The fix adds `useMemo` to the client table sorting operation, preventing the O(n log n) sort from running on every render (e.g., when pagination changes). CI checks have passed.

The full report is available locally at `/home/ubuntu/repos/client-vital-suite/EFFICIENCY_REPORT.md` if you'd like me to share it. You can leave comments directly on the PR for any changes.

ATTACHMENT:"https://app.devin.ai/attachments/3e57773d-e34f-4838-b8b2-16299c36dd07/EFFICIENCY_REPORT.md"
